elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which balance sheet ratios do you know? Name five.
elements.correctAnswer: Liquidity ratio (1-3), gearing ratio, financing ratio, asset coverage ratio, return on equity

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is meant by the term liquidity?
elements.correctAnswer: Liquidity measures the ability to settle debts.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What are the guideline values for liquidity?
elements.correctAnswer: Liquidity ratio 1 should be between 15 and 30 percent; liquidity ratio 2 should be higher than 100 percent; liquidity ratio 3 should be between 150 and 200 percent.
